label: 大隈重信
本: The Meiji Restoration . Stanford University Press . 1972
見出し読み: おおくま しげのぶ
説明文: (1838-1922). Hizen hirazamurai (400 koku). Student of Rangaku, then of English; held domain offices connected with finance and foreign trade before 1868. Senior Hizen member of early Meiji government; leader of modernizing group. Later, political party leader, cabinet minister.
